article.name: External monitoring error "x509: certificate signed by unknown authority"
article.title: External monitoring error "x509: certificate signed by unknown authority"
article.body:
Configuring an external monitor may trigger an alert with the message "x509: certificate signed by unknown authority".

Although it's difficult to determine a specific factor as a cause, in many cases, similar errors occur because intermediate certificate configurations are omitted.

If you recieve the message "x509: certificate signed by unknown authority", please check whether or not the intermediate certificate was installed correctly.
